channel.title: Running UBI and I-Bot
channel.description: Sorry for asking this question in advance. Ok I downloaded the UBI interface > Opened up a Runescape Client > The Interface opened up> the black dot appears > Now what do I do :confused: ? I downloaded Eclipse but I'm just clueless on how to run 2 Scar Scripts at the same time on 2 different characters. I tried looking for a tutorial or something but couldn't find any. Sorry for asking this if there is a tutorial. If there is one please give me a link.

item.title: Running UBI and I-Bot
item.dc:creator: @Nisoten Nisoten
item.description:
@Nisoten wrote:

Thanks, Is this big enough? Lmao

item.title: Running UBI and I-Bot
item.dc:creator: @bobert5696 bobert5696
item.description:
@bobert5696 wrote:

i-bot and ubi are seperate, i-bot is in progress, ubi is done, u use eclipse for i-bot, for ubi, pen 2 scars, and 2 runescape windows (assuming youknow how to dual log) make sure you move everything around so you can see both rs clients (if your screen s too small your f’ed) then select 1 rs game with 1 scar, and the other for the other, press run on both scars and your good to go

Read full topic
